sentence.Network_en: He unwarily treads upon a viper asleep just before his feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不小心踩到正睡在他脚前的蛇上.

sentence.Network_en: Luckily I saved enough money to pay these unwarily - contract debts.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸运的是我存了足够的钱来付这些不谨慎欠下的债.

sentence.Network_en: He walked unwarily into the trap.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unwanted 不必要的unwarily 没注意地-
Attracted by a bird flying from south , he unwarily walk into the chestnut garden ., 他被一只从南方飞来的大鸟所吸引 , 不经意地走进了栗园里.
unwanted 无用的, unwarily 不留心的, unwanted 有缺点的
